row.process: ! creates a file :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME# = "SQL_Script_&$PROCESSOR_RUNID#.sql" :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS "&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" = "&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#" echo &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# >> "&UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME#" :ELSE echo "&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#" >> "&UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME#" :ENDIF
